duties_responsibilities.duty: Act as a key resource on all aspects of annual budgeting.
Ensure that all department budget information reports are prepared accurately and in a timely manner.
Articulate all deviations to the annual budget to Management.
Assist with the integration of budget information into the accounting system and perform analysis.
Perform monthly analytics to explain actual vs. projected expenses.
Assist various departments to model out projected expenses.
Complete monthly payments and accrual entries.
Assist with review of cost center allocations.
Provide technical support for the budget system.
Assist with budget and expense reforecasts.
Assist with monthly 'actual vs. budget' variance analysis.
Provide technical assistance for budget and actual headcount reports.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field (Master's preferred)
